comments: All quizzes & assignments are online which are easy to do. 2 exams are online & he allows only HANDWRITTEN notes & 2 other exams are taken in class which are open notes too. Loved the easy class participation & discussions made it really fun I would definitely take him again! Be prepared to get called on. He also curves tests so students pass.

comments: I took the online International Business Class in Hybrid section. IT IS HARD, and a lots of work to do. But I rather taking it short and heavy instead of in long-term. He is very clear, gives good feedback. Test is hard but he does give you mercy and curve at the end. Other than the exams, all the homeworks are totally up to your dedication. Easy!

Rather than answering your questions he tells you to find it on your own or says you should already know the answer. Don\'t ask when something is due, "it\'s in the syllabus". Class was uncomfortable

comments: I took Professor Ferrera for an 8 week International Business online course. As with all online courses, there is a lot of work. If you take the 8 week, expect 3 full chapter Learn Smarts+3 chapter quizzes,a discussion + journal entry 1 week of work. But if you do the work, READ the chapters, you can pass with an A. cheat sheet allowed for exams!

comments: The guy is amazing. He encourages us to think critically and tries to teach everybody to be prepared. He mentions jobs with any new topic. We have debates and get many chances to voice our own opinions. You\'ll do great if you show up and get in the conversation. I would tell you to be prepared for class, most homework is on line. Recommend him!

comments: ELI Summer course. A lot of reading and writing. 3 chapters a week usually, a quiz for each, a discussion board due Wednesday night, and journal weekly journal entry. 2 exams, were pretty tough. No group assignments which made it easier to focus on the weekly topic. More difficult then expected but the usual for an online course.

comments: ELI Course. The class is pretty writing intensive. There is a weekly one page journal AND group discussion (with responses). There is homework typically 3 chapters a week. There are two exams. You can use an 8 by 11 cheat sheet on both exams. If you read the book and do the homework you should be alright in this class. Tough but fair.

comments: I took this class during summer for a 5 weeks class and I was very skeptical because of the fast pace. Prof. Ferrara was absolutely amazing. He always makes references to the real world and he makes sure we understand all concepts. We had 5 exams: 3 online and 2 in class. Just read the chapters and take notes and you\'ll love this class!

comments: Dr. Ferrara is a caring and knowledgeable and inspirational professor. He answers questions, gives direct and individual feedback that students can use to improve. Seems to be the only professor I have had that knows how to teach on line. I will be taking his BUS 280 class and will be reading this app to know what to expect. He is a great professor

comments: Professor Ferrara is charismatic, engaging, objective and clearly defines what is expected. He relates the curriculum to life experiences which makes it more interesting. Take good notes, show up for class, and do the assignments on time and you\'ll be sure to pass.
